objects.name: LocalConfirm
objects.string: Play against a friend in person.

objects.name: TimeDisclaimer
objects.string: SECONDS it takes for the game to end automatically.

objects.name: AutoDisclaimer
objects.string: Remove grabbing, and automatically throw instead.

objects.name: ComebackDisclaimer
objects.string: Whoever is currently losing gains a speed boost.

objects.name: ChargeDisclaimer
objects.string: The longer you hold the ball, the farther you throw.

objects.name: ChargeDisclaimerCPU
objects.string: Throw modes do not work for the CPU.

objects.name: WinScoreDisclaimer
objects.string: The amount of points required to end/win the game.

parameters: "Each hoop you score nets you one point for your team. First to reach " + ToString(GlobalVariable(WinningScore)) + " points wins!"
"Every time you score, you gain one life and the opponents lose one life! First to reach 0 lives loses."
"Score " + ToString(GlobalVariable(WinningScore)) + " goals before your opponent scores 1 goal to win!"
